name: Margherita
details: Classic simplicity at its finest, our Margherita pizza boasts a harmonious blend of tangy tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, aromatic basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Pepperoni Passion
details: For the pepperoni enthusiast, our Pepperoni Passion pizza is a flavorful delight featuring zesty tomato sauce, gooey mozzarella, spicy pepperoni, and a sprinkle of red pepper flakes.

name: Seafood Sensation
details: Dive into the deep with our Seafood Sensation pizza, featuring a luscious garlic sauce, succulent shrimp, tender calamari, plump mussels, fresh spinach, and juicy tomatoes.
